## Type of Change
<!-- Check the relevant option(s) -->

- [ ] Feature - New feature or enhancement
- [ ] Bug Fix - Fix for a bug or issue
- [ ] Refactor - Code refactoring without changing functionality
- [ ] Documentation - Documentation updates
- [ ] Test - Adding or updating tests
- [ ] Chore - Maintenance tasks (dependencies, configuration, etc.)

## Pre-Merge Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's code style (PEP 8)
- [ ] Code is formatted with `black`
- [ ] Code passes `flake8` linting
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced

### Testing
- [ ] All tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] New tests added for new features or bug fixes
- [ ] Existing tests updated if needed

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed (README, docstrings, etc.)
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md updated if workflow changed

### Git
- [ ] Commits follow the commit message format
- [ ] Branch is up-to-date with `main`
- [ ] Branch name follows naming conventions
